hsapi_request.Rd

Helper function for: GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests.

hsapi_request(path, type, ...)

Arguments

path

API Request Path
type

Request Type (GET, POST, PUT, or DELETE)
...

Parameters passed onto a httr request
